attributes.action: WHY SHOULD THE BRITISH TAXPAYERS HAVE TO PAY EXTORTIONATE AMOUNTS OF LICENCE FEE MONEY TO BBC EX EMPLOYEES SURREPTITIOUSLY .
attributes.additional_details: Why should the British taxpayer have to pay the extortionate pay settlements of employees of the BBC who have been paid ex-gratia payments they were not entitled to.We the British public through licence fees have paid for these payments.If we didn't pay the licence fee we would be prosecuted what action is being taken against these ex employees.
